snippet: Noel Chanan’s book “The Photographer of Penllergare” traces the work of John Dillwyn Llewelyn.
abstract: Long-forgotten work of amateur scientist and pioneering British photographer John Dillwyn Llewelyn can be seen in Noel Chanan's book The Photographer of Penllergare: A Life of John Dillwyn Llewelyn 1810-1882.
lead_paragraph: Noel Chanan’s book “The Photographer of Penllergare” traces the work of John Dillwyn Llewelyn.
